name: Chameleon Scales
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Kobolds of Golarion. © 2013 Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: You temporarily alter the color of your skin, hide, or scales to another option legal for your race. You take no penalty for using Disguise to appear as a member of a different race as long as that race has the same type and color of skin, hide, or scales as you.
text_zh: 你暂时改变了你的肤色，皮肤或鳞片成另一个与你的种族合宜的选择(to another option legal for your race)。你成为这不同种族所进行的易容检定上不会有减值，如同这个种族与你一样有着相同种类与颜色的肤色，皮肤或鳞片。
